data.name: Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean - Maid Costumes
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes a set of maid costumes which include:
  • Maid Hoodie Accessories
  • Maid Sleeves
  • Customizable colours

To use these items, go to inventory machine in the centre of the 1st floor.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC includes a set of maid costumes which include:
  • Maid Hoodie Accessories
  • Maid Sleeves

data.short_description: A set of player maid costume outfits for Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
